title: SEO EXPERT / GOOGLE ADWORDS
job_overview:
HI , WE ARE A GROUP OF SMALL COMPANIES,  LOOKING FOR A SEO AND GOOGLE ADWORDS SPECIALIST TO JOIN OUR COMPANY ON A FULLTIME BASIS.

What will be your responsibilities? 

Setting up and managing paid search campaigns on Google and Bing Ads
Analysing, optimising and reporting on paid search campaigns
Testing different bid and match strategies to achieve the best results 
Using SEO tools (e.g. Semrush) to report on organic search metrics
Keep up to date with the latest SEO practices and algorithm updates
Conduct site audits and develop strategies to improve rankings and domain authority
Collate, analyse, and produce insightful reports for all search marketing activities in collaboration with our data & insights specialist

What skills and experience will you bring to the table? 

Advanced knowledge of SEO tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Tag Manager, Semrush, Moz, Ahrefs, Google Trends
2+ years' experience developing and implementing SEO strategies, ideally in an agency
Strong understanding of content strategy, keyword strategy, domain authority and link building
2+ years’ experience managing paid search campaigns
Problem solving (you will need it for Google Tag Manager!)
Confident and clear communicator (able to ‘dumb down’ tech when needed)
Passion for all things web & digital
Ambition - we aim to delight our clients every day and this means staying ahead of the search game
